title: Lütfi Fikri Bey
text: Lütfi Fikri <a href="Bey">Bey</a> (1872 – 1934) was an Ottoman <a href="Liberalism">liberal</a> politician and jurist, who was a member of the <a href="Freedom%20and%20Accord%20Party">Liberal Union</a>. He was a strong critic of the <a href="Committee%20of%20Union%20and%20Progress">Committee of Union and Progress</a>.
